name: PØUR WISDØM
description:
Seeing human life that is getting
worse and out of control of his greed
for money and power makes the
joker also increasingly crazy and
uncontrolled about his brutalism. This
chaos makes the Joker want to
changes the world even more with the
ways and rules that he wants. He
wants all human beings to be real
among each other, to be able to
respect life and not to be crazy about
money and power.
